评论概述: Beautiful studded belt and accurate sizes
评论详情: I got this belt in size 31"-35" and it fits true-to-size.  I wear a size 10 in women's pants, and I have about a 30" waist and 40" hips.  So I can wear this belt at my waist or a little bit lower, but it doesn't quite work for low-midrise pants that sit around my hips.  The next size up wasn't available or I would probably have gotten it for more options to wear, but regardless I really like the brown color, style, and feel of it.  Make sure to order the size that matches your measurements of where you plan to wear the belt (waist, hips, or in between).The studs give it a bit of weight and the gold tip on the end make it look more expensive than it is.  As an elder millenial/emo kid who fully embraced the black and silver studded belts of the early 2000's, I feel like this is the grown-up version of that.  Overall I love this belt and plan to get a black one too!

评论概述: Perfect Belt for Effortless Style and Comfort!
评论详情: •The silver buckle and silver stud add a sleek, polished touch. •High-quality material that feels durable and well-made. •Adjustable fit, perfect for a variety of outfits. •Versatile design works with both casual and dressy looks. •Great value for the price and fast delivery.
This belt is the finish touch to elevate any outfit!!
I really like the look of this belt. It’s a perfect width and length. It fits great and is sturdy. It looks like real leather and I love the studs!

This is a beautiful belt.  Well-made using quality materials.  I was incredibly disappointed in the fit.  I ordered what I thought was the right size, but it runs incredibly small.  I can't use it but may consider getting another one because it is very nice.
True to size, durable, fashionable, functional, and so cute! I get loads of complements on it. Also very durable with many different sizing holes.

评论概述: Studs and stylized buckle look great; works well as a statement belt in either dressy or punk style
评论详情: Good:  Nice decorated belt design; studs and stylized buckle look great Works well as a statement belt in either dressy or punk style Brown and gold look great together

So far, this belt has been great. The studded design is eye-catching without being too much, and the fit is right. The leather feels smooth and comfortable, and the gold buckle adds a nice touch of flair. For the price, the quality seems really good, and it pairs well with jeans, pants, or dresses.

The design itself with the studs all around is nice.  The color is nice as well.The length was accurate but that's about it.  The quality is poor.  It's thin and flimsy.  It's a man made material which I already expected but I didn't expect it to be so thin.  It needs to be thicker.  It twists easily.  It's also too narrow.  I was expecting it to be wider.  It doesn't fill your belt loop and I don't like the look of that.  It came with a belt hole puncher which I  thought was a nuce touch but the product itself I am not impressed with. I'm giving it 2.5 stars
I’ve ordered 3 belts from Amazon, they were all huge and impossible to size down. This belt gives you the option of a SIZE, and it fits perfectly! Worth every cent! Love it!
Belt fits good and it comes with a little tool to tighten the divets!
great belt - looks very high quality and works well with a casual outfit and to dress up. I don't know how well it will hold up, but it feels great at the moment!

I love this belt!I am going to purchase it in black as well. The gold hardware on it looks expensive and it is very cute. The gold looks gold and not that brushed brass color. This would make a great gift or if you just need a trendy good-looking belt. The fit is true to size but obviously, there is a bit of room since there are various notches. Beautifully made for being fake leather and really looks great with jeans.

评论概述: Bought this in two colors so far! Great dupe for high end versions.
评论详情: I previously purchased this belt in black and gold and liked it so much that I came back for a second color! The brown is a perfect cognac/saddle shade. This is an excellent-quality dupe for the $580 KHAITE or $78 Madewell versions. I'm between a size 6-8 (28/29 in jeans) and ordered size 32"-36". It's a soft, flexible material, and the gold-toned hardware is a very realistic gold that's not too yellow or orange. It is PU leather, which won't last forever. But it's well made and a quality product for the price. It's a great alternative to spending much more money on a trendy item that will eventually phase out of style.
This is such a fun belt. Beautiful and well-made, I got lots of compliments when I wore the first time.

评论概述: Almost perfect, and with an extra touch of caring
评论详情: Leather belts can be extremely expensive and my own taste runs to "All Saints"...a kind of punk look but fashionable (I am a bit too old for goth!).  I was very surprised how great this belt was when I opened the package...serious looking studs, decent leather, great sizing...plus the seller included a special nail for adding extra holes (I mean, who does that?).  Very impressed.  I would have given it 5 stars but the hardware is a bit too glitzy for me... I am a professional artist so I will rub it with a bit of black acrylic paint to subdue the gold abit and it will take a place next to my sadly MUCH more expensive belts I bought elsewhere.  Great value!
Nice belt for the price. Seemed a bit short for the size I ordered but still fit.
Love this belt! Very well made and the price is unbelievable!

Ooh, I really like this belt! Not only is it made well- the gold studs and tipped end look high end - it's also very fashionable. I've seen similar belts like this in luxury stores, so am thrilled to have this budget friendly option for when I want to give my waist some edgy flair!

This is an excellent belt! I really love the look. It works for the office or for casual looks with jeans. Its perfect! I have a 28" waist but always size up in these belts because they tend to run small. The 31-35" works perfectly for me! Definitely recommend!
I'm in love with this belt, the color is gorgeous, is edgy, bohemian. Can bw use in any season. The faux leather looks upscale and is true to size.
